review: What's not to love about Roku? It was very,  very easy to set up. I had it out of the box and set up within 10 minutes of it arriving. It's always on and is still working as good as the day we got it. My only gripe is that for some reason the Roku logs me out of the channel apps every few days. So at least once a week I have to go through and reset every channel.  That is a bit of a headache. Also,  I wish the remote had less buttons like Blockbuster on it. We've bought two of these now and I recommend it to anyone who needs something quick and easy to work with.
